name: Kairos Station Evac
description:
Story & Gameplay

The year is 2154. Kairos Station has been incident free for 35 days. With only a month under his belt, the new captain finds themselves at a new crisis threatening the whole station. Can you save everyone on board in 10 seconds?

Genre: Puzzle

Controls

WASD to move. E to interact. Q to Skip. Tab to Exit.

Credits

Created by Nils Foerster, Adrian Herbers, Patrick Herbers, and Patrick Quiskamp.

Programming by: NF,  PH,  PQ

Design: NF,  AH,  PH,  PQ

Art: AH,  PH,  PQ

Sounds: PH

Music: PH

A message just for you

Thanks for taking your time and playing our game. We hope you have a good day.
